description: The outbreak at the Ischgl resort in Tyrol has been linked to cases in 45 different countries.
title: Ischgl: Austria sued over Tyrol ski resort's Covid-19 outbreak
title_page: Ischgl: Austria sued over Tyrol ski resort's Covid-19 outbreak - BBC News
maintext: "On 25 February, the authorities closed down a hotel in Innsbruck because one of the employees had tested positive, so that means the authorities reacted immediately when this case in Innsbruck - the capital of the province of Tyrol - became known.
